jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Exercise robust analytical on P/L report particularly cost and expenses, understand the cost and expenses trends on month to month basis
  • Set-up annual budget mainly for Opex and Capex, which align to GOJEK strategies and management goals
  • Monitor and control the actual cost and expenses disbursement, including the daily PO execution.
  • Work closely with GOJEK Key Stakeholders (Corporate Development, Function head and Production head) to monitor and control the actual performance vs budget.
  • Provide recommendation to increase cost efficiency and effectiveness.
  • Prepare expense report on monthly basis including the fluctuation analysis and variance analysis against budget.
  • Identify, aggregating and assigning cost and expenses under function to product by using relevant key-drivers in order to generate calculation of profitability report by product
  • Support the reporting process for management decision making

• At least 10 years of experience in a public accounting firm (Big 4 is preferable)
  • Minimum a Bachelor degree from a reputable university with major in Finance, Accountancy, Banking, Business Studies, Administration, Management or equivalent
  • Knowledgeable in cost management concepts and terminologies, including cost allocation and define cost baseline
  • Has positive mind set, forward thinking attitude and "can do" attitude 
  • Preference given to candidates that currently hold a similar position within a large established corporation
  • Bi-lingual Bahasa Indonesia and English
